sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_cls_idea"> <x_snc_cls_idea action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <description>Demonstrate the use of instanceof to determine if a parameter is a sys_id or GlideRecord. Example: var ju = new Util(gameGr); var ju = new Util(gameID);  Used in script include initialize() to set up "this" variables (see Jeopardy Util()) Also consider typeof for Javascript primitive variables like boolean, string, etc </description> <episode display_value="NOWCommunity Live Stream - 2019-04-26">41798fa5db493b00f6d0a422ca9619a5</episode> <name>Variable instanceof GlideRecord</name> <script/> <sys_created_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-04-01 14:27:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>63da1621dbe03700f6d0a422ca9619fa</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-04-26 14:26:07</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_cls_idea> </record_update>
